page.title: 04MARKET GARDENS
page.content: MY GRANDADS MARKET GARDEN by DONNA JACKMAN MY GRANDAD USED TO RUN A MARKET GARDEN .HE GREW VEGETABLES AND SALAD PRODUCE AND WHAT HE GREW HE WOULD SELL THEM ON A STALL AT GRIMSBY MARKET.IT WAS VERY HARD WORK AND VERY LONG HOURS.MY MUM USED TO WORK FOR MY GRANDAD WHEN SHE LEFT SCHOOL.ON MARKET DAYS MY MUM WOULD HAVE TO GET UP AT 5.O,CLOCK IN THE MORNING SO AS SHE WAS AT THE MARKET FOR 6.O,CLOCK.THEY WOULD NOT GET HOME UNTIL 6.30 AT NIGHT,AND THEN WORK ON THE LAND GETTING VEGETABLES READY FOR THE NEXT DAY.THEY FINISH THEIR DAYS WORK AT ABOUT 10.00.ON THE DAYS WHEN THERE WAS NO MARKET.MY GRANDAD AND MY MUM USED TO RUN A MOBILE SHOPIN GRIMSBY.THE MARKET DAYS WERE TUESDAYS,FRIDAYS AND SATURDAY . AND THE MOBILE SHOP ROUND WAS ON MONDAYS,WEDNESDAYS AND THURSDAYS.
